entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Forestville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 8.
